The claim states that Marco Rubio spent: 400K of taxpayer dollars remodeling offices and building a members-only lounge.
The claim is supported by a Facebook pos: which includes a link to a 2010 Tampa Bay Times/Miami Herald story about Rubio's use of a Republican Party of Florida credit card.
The Tampa Bay Times: Miami Herald story confirms that Rubio spent about $400,000 in tax dollars to remodel offices and build a members-only dining room.
Records from the Speaker: s Office show that Rubio ordered almost $560,000 in renovations, indicating that the claim of $400K spent is accurate.
